mapper.insert: insert into favorite (favoriteId, userId, movieId, tvplayId, status) values (#{favoriteid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{movieid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tvplayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select favoriteId, userId, movieId, tvplayId, status from favorite
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where movieId = #{movieid} and userId=#{userid}
delete from favorite where tvplayId = #{tvplayid} and userId=#{userid}
